entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:26 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 3:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -37.8°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -42.1°C
Wind: WNW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 38.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 38. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 36.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 51 in the evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
